other_title: アンジュ・ヴィエルジュ (Japanese)
plot: The spontaneous opening of dimensional portals to alternate Earths has awakened magical powers in young girls. These girls, known as "Progress" use their newfound "Exceed" abilities to protect their home worlds from destruction. They gather at the massive Seiran Academy to confront the common enemy threatening all five worlds, Ouroboros.
opening_theme: "Love is MY RAIL" by Konomi Suzuki
